summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6161 for the improvement of Inverness Drive from East 85th Street to the Northern Pacific Railroad right-of way; and certain other streets, avenues, and easements; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 86177, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
